entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 6. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early in the evening. Flurries at times heavy beginning in the evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023
